text: Need Quinn Cook for Lush campaign. Budget around $4,731, looking for 3 x Facebook post, 1 x Twitter post, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x Podcast guest, 3 x 2-minute tutorial. 11 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 4 months.
